The surf.plugin Module¶

Contents:

  • The surf.plugin.reader Module
  • The surf.plugin.query_reader Module

Base Class¶

class surf.plugin.Plugin(*args, **kwargs)¶

super class for all surf Plugins, provides basic instantiation + logging

enable_logging(enable=True)¶
enables or disables loggin for the current plugin
is_enable_logging()¶
True if logging is enabled
